description:
Citrix CXS-203: XenServer 6.0 Administration


With the Citrix suite of credentials, you can be amongst those elite IT Professionals respected for their skills regarding Citrix solutions.

With ITonlinelearning’s Citrix XenApp 6 Training, students are provided the foundation knowledge necessary to effectively install, configure, administer, and troubleshoot XenServer 6.0 and Provisioning Services 6.0.

In addition you will learn to:

• Manage and Maintain Virtual Machines
• Install and configure Provisioning Services
• Manage vDisks and Target Devices
• Implement resource Pools
• Implement the Distributed Virtual Switch (DVS)
• Implement Workload balancing (WLB)
• Configuring High Availability

In this free course i will bring to you only the foundation knowledge necessary to effectively install XenServer
title: Citrix XenServer 6.0 Administration - Installation Guide
